### Favorite Comics

I’ve read a ton of X-Men over the years. Beyond the powers and fight scenes, what sticks with me is how it reflects real-world struggles faced by marginalized communities. I’ve always loved the way Magneto and Professor X parallel Malcolm X and Martin Luther King Jr. — that contrast in ideology makes the story hit deeper. I used to have a whole screenshot stash of the funniest X-Men moments, but it got lost somewhere along the way. So here’s to starting fresh and rebuilding the archive (well eventually... under construction)
